segments.text: Do you know how happy I am ? The Ant Kingdom is a perfect world with colorful fairy tales . It seems like the air is fresh here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on baby , stop trying to pretend like a man . If you go there , you are sure to like them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hurry up ! Hurry up ! What lovely caterpillars are over there !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I said you are sure to like them . There is the Grand Parade Of Ants Carnival in a few minutes in the square . You will experience a dream of fantasy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All kinds of insects dress themselves up . They drive straight their own Flower Cars along the Parade Avenue of Ants Kingdom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's splendid . Can you take three pictures of me with them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought you had grown out of such child practices .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cut it out . Look at my smile , and it seems like the flowers in the spring . Right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hurry up ! The smile is frozen on my face .
segments.speaker: S2
